thread.title: Trump hits Sanders: U.S. needs 'tough strong leader ... it's not this guy'
thread.title_full: Trump hits Sanders: U.S. needs 'tough strong leader ... it's not this guy' | Washington Examiner

author: Al Weaver
title: Trump hits Sanders: U.S. needs 'tough strong leader ... it's not this guy'
text:
Donald Trump had two reactions to the first Democratic debate: the Democrats' 2016 field is quite boring , and Bernie Sanders has no business being president.
In one of his patented Instagram posts Wednesday, Trump took aim at the Vermont socialist, ripping him for not being a "tough, strong leader" and unfit to "defend" the U.S.
In the spot, it shows video of Sanders giving up the microphone to Black Lives Matter protesters during an August event in Seattle , for which Trump had previously blasted Sanders.
"The world is a dangerous place. We need a tough, strong leader," the ad's voiceover says before declaring, "and it's not this guy."
More from the Washington Examiner Your Voice, Your Choice: Ask Bobby Jindal a question Gov. Bobby Jindal, R-La., will be fielding questions on Monday Oct. 26, at 7 p.m. ET.
By Washington Examiner Staff â€¢ 10/14/15 2:38 PM "Bernie can't even defend his microphone. How will he defend the country?" the ad narrator asks at the end.
Trump continues to lead the GOP 2016 horse race, holding a lead nationally over Dr. Ben Carson, 23-19, in the latest RealClearPolitics polling average. He also tops the Washington Examiner 's latest power rankings .
